diff_hunk:
@@ -150,13 +150,14 @@ def Test(self):

     for size in 1, 2, 5, 10:

         shape = batch_dims + (size, size)

body: @jheymann85 I agree that we should consider changing the gradients of the functions manipulating Hermitian matrices to return a Hermitian gradient. But that should be done separately from this change, and for all such method in a single update.
body_html: @jheymann85 I agree that we should consider changing the gradients of the functions manipulating Hermitian matrices to return a Hermitian gradient. But that should be done separately from this change, and for all such method in a single update.
